main.net.atos.uk.TravelDashboard.Database

Class DataConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.net.atos.uk.TravelDashboard.Database.DatabaseConnector
      • main.net.atos.uk.TravelDashboard.Database.DataConnector

  • public class DataConnector
extends DatabaseConnector
    This class contains all the methods to extract and upload data. The methods are used in: main Dashboard to generate general summary of all uploaded data, report page to generate specific report, upload page to upload data to the database.
    Since:
    2017-04-8
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Niall Garratt

    • Method Detail

      • toGetUserBudget

        public double toGetUserBudget(java.lang.String budgetDate)
        The method is used in main Dashboard for user to get the 6 months budget they set.
        Parameters:
        budgetDate - the specified budget date, in the form of "xxxx-Hx" (for example "2017-H1")
        Returns:
        user budget

      • toUploadUserBudget

        public boolean toUploadUserBudget(java.lang.String budgetDate,
                                  double budgetAmount)
        The method is used in main Dashboard for user to set up 6 months budget. If the budget is set before, it updated. Otherwise it is set. This is done by MySql 'REPLACE'.
        Parameters:
        budgetDate - the specified budget date, in the form of "xxxx-Hx" (for example "2017-H1")
        budgetAmount - the total amount of the specified time budget
        Returns:
        upload successful or not

      • toGetUserClaims

        public java.util.ArrayList<Receipt> toGetUserClaims()
        The method is used when data analysis is needed. It is used in: the main Dashboard to process general analysis, the report page to process analysis in details. Essentially it returns all the claims that current user have ever uploaded, as an ArrayList. All the filter action (filter by specific employee ID, specific WBS number or specific time amount) is done based on this ArrayList. The method uses CurrentUserInfo class to obtain current user ID.
        Returns:
        the ArrayList that contains all the data

      • toDeleteExcelInfo

        public boolean toDeleteExcelInfo(ExcelFile ef)
        The method is used when the user decided to remove claims by Excel file they updated. It is used in upload page.
        Parameters:
        ef - the excel file contains its information
        Returns:
        delete successful or not

      • toUploadExcelInfo

        public boolean toUploadExcelInfo(ExcelFile ef)
        The method is used to store the Excel information. It stores the current user ID, along with the Excel file name and the upload time. In the database side, the primary key is increased automatically (by 1).
        Parameters:
        ef - the excel file contains its information
        Returns:
        upload successful or not

      • getLatestFileID

        public int getLatestFileID()
        The method is used to get the biggest number of Excel file ID (the ID in database side, as primary key). The process is: (when the user click confirm after they saw the table of upload claims in upload page) toUploadExcelInfo() method insert the Excel file record to the database, the Excel file ID in the database side is handled automatically (increase 1). At the moment, the actual claims (the data) has not yet been uploaded. To do this, the Excel file ID is needed. The ID that has been increased is what we need. It must be the biggest number of Excel file ID belongs to the current user.
        Returns:
        the latest file id

      • toUploadClaims

        public boolean toUploadClaims(int fileID,
                              javafx.collections.ObservableList<Receipt> claims)
        As explained before, the method is used to upload the actual claims (the data) to the database.
        Parameters:
        fileID - the excel file ID (database side, primary key) that the data belongs to
        the - to-be-uploaded data
        Returns:
        upload successful or not

      • toGetExcelFileList

        public javafx.collections.transformation.SortedList<ExcelFile> toGetExcelFileList()
        The method is used to get the Excel information. It is used in: main Dashboard to display the last four records of upload, upload page to display all of the records of upload.
        Returns:
        a sorted list of Excel files by upload time
